<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

## IMessage interface

Represents a DIDComm v1 message payload, with optionally decoded credentials and presentations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMessage
```

## Properties

| Property                                           | Type                                                            | Description                                                            |
| -------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [createdAt?](./core.imessage.createdat.md)         | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Creation date (ISO 8601)                   |
| [credentials?](./core.imessage.credentials.md)     | [VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md) \[\]     | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Array of attached verifiable credentials   |
| [data?](./core.imessage.data.md)                   | object &#124; null                                              | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Parsed data                                |
| [expiresAt?](./core.imessage.expiresat.md)         | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Expiration date (ISO 8601)                 |
| [from?](./core.imessage.from.md)                   | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Sender DID                                 |
| [id](./core.imessage.id.md)                        | string                                                          | Unique message ID                                                      |
| [metaData?](./core.imessage.metadata.md)           | [IMetaData](./core.imetadata.md) \[\] &#124; null               | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Array of message metadata                  |
| [presentations?](./core.imessage.presentations.md) | [VerifiablePresentation](./core.verifiablepresentation.md) \[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Array of attached verifiable presentations |
| [raw?](./core.imessage.raw.md)                     | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Original message raw data                  |
| [replyTo?](./core.imessage.replyto.md)             | string\[\]                                                      | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. List of DIDs to reply to                   |
| [replyUrl?](./core.imessage.replyurl.md)           | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. URL to post a reply message to             |
| [threadId?](./core.imessage.threadid.md)           | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Thread ID                                  |
| [to?](./core.imessage.to.md)                       | string                                                          | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Recipient DID                              |
| [type](./core.imessage.type.md)                    | string                                                          | Message type                                                           |
